entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Baker Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:30 PM CST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Clear, -37.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Baker Lake Airport 5:00 PM CST Saturday 11 February 2023
Condition: Mainly Clear
Temperature: -37.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 40.2 km
Humidity: 65 %
Wind Chill: -49
Dewpoint: -41.7°C
Wind: N 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Temperature rising to minus 31 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 31 by morning. Wind chill minus 49 this evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High minus 26.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning in the morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 26. Wind chill minus 43 in the morning and minus 38 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 26.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming northeast 20 overnight. Temperature steady near minus 26. Wind chill near minus 38. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Saturday 11 February 2023
